blogPost.excerpt: Exhausted with endless Zoom Meetings? Grapevine allows you to get asynchronous (one-way) video updates from your team each morning. Short one-way video updates help keep remote and local teams connected without having to schedule or attend in-person meetings.
blogPost.body: Exhausted with endless Zoom Meetings? Grapevine allows you to get asynchronous (one-way) video updates from your team each morning. Short one-way video updates help keep remote and local teams connected without having to schedule or attend in-person meetings.
blogPost.title: Grapevine 2.0 - Schedule fewer zoom meetings with one-way video updates
blogPost.author: Brandyn Morelli

localize.description: 被没完没了的变速会搞得筋疲力尽？Grapevine允许您每天早上从您的团队获取异步(单向)视频更新。简短的单向视频更新可帮助远程和本地团队保持联系，而无需安排或参加面对面会议。
localize.tagline: 通过单向视频更新安排更少的缩放会议

localize.description: 被沒完沒了的變速會搞得筋疲力盡？Grapevine允許您每天早上從您的團隊獲取異步(單向)視頻更新。簡短的單向視頻更新可幫助遠程和本地團隊保持聯繫，而無需安排或參加面對面會議。
localize.tagline: 通過單向視頻更新安排更少的縮放會議

previous.excerpt: Our Polaris for Admin Web UI kit is now available in Figma. You can access the full kit in Figma with reusable components and up-to-date Polaris guidelines, icons, and color palette. Find out more at https://figma.com/@shopify and https://polaris.shopify.com
previous.title: Polaris for Admin Figma UI kit - Shopify Polaris UI kit now available in Figma

localize.description: 我们的Polaris for Admin Web UI工具包现在可以在图中找到。您可以通过可重用组件和最新的北极星指南、图标和调色板访问Figma中的完整套件。欲了解更多信息，请访问https://figma.com/@shopify和https://polaris.shopify.com
localize.tagline: Shopify Polaris UI套件现已在图中提供

localize.description: 我們的Polaris for Admin Web UI工具包現在可以在圖中找到。您可以通過可重用組件和最新的北極星指南、圖標和調色板訪問Figma中的完整套件。欲瞭解更多信息，請訪問https://figma.com/@shopify和https://polaris.shopify.com
localize.tagline: Shopify Polaris UI套件現已在圖中提供

next.excerpt: Fiddy is a weekly leaderboard of the best new Indie Hacker side projects. Like, comment on, or share the best projects you find, or submit your own to compete every week.
next.title: Fiddy 2.0 - A weekly leaderboard of the best new side projects

localize.description: Fiddy是最好的新独立黑客辅助项目的每周排行榜。喜欢、评论或分享你找到的最好的项目，或者每周提交你自己的项目参加竞争。
localize.tagline: 每周一次的最佳新辅助项目排行榜

localize.description: Fiddy是最好的新獨立黑客輔助項目的每週排行榜。喜歡、評論或分享你找到的最好的項目，或者每週提交你自己的項目參加競爭。
localize.tagline: 每週一次的最佳新輔助項目排行榜
